definition: Ministry of Civil Affairs (MCA) of the PRC
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: Some even suspect that the modern welfare, is the civil affairs department coffers.
sentences.chinese: 有人甚至怀疑现代福利院，是民政部门的小金库。

sentences.english: The donations will be channelled to the quake zone through the Ministry of Civil Affairs and the Red Cross Society of China.
sentences.chinese: 全部款项将民政部和中国红十字会送达地震灾区。

sentences.english: Branch of various civil administration is comprehensive and normative system of small custodial put in order.
sentences.chinese: 各级民政部门全面规范了低保管理制度。

sentences.english: Other materials required by the Civil Affairs Department.
sentences.chinese: 民政部门规定应当提交的其他材料。

sentences.english: Some even suspect that the modern welfare is the civil affairs department coffers.
sentences.chinese: 甚至有人怀疑，现代福利，是民政部门的小金库。

sentences.english: Civil affairs departments are still tallying the losses, and the disaster relief work is continuing.
sentences.chinese: 民政部门仍在清点损失，救灾工作仍在进行中。

sentences.english: Article 3 The department of civil affairs under the State Council shall be responsible for funeral and interment control throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 第三条国务院民政部门负责全国的殡葬管理工作。

sentences.english: The MOHA minister has signed an order to publish a newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 在民政部部长签署命令，发布报纸。

sentences.english: The civil affairs department in Beijing is mulling rules to subsidize those who opt for sea-burial, which is considered a green option for cremains disposal.
sentences.chinese: 北京民政部门正在制定细则拟对海葬进行补贴。

sentences.english: The lowest living ensure job is the most important job of civil administration department.
sentences.chinese: 最低生活保障工作是民政部门的一项重要工作。

sentences.english: Reporting the family fosterage goings to the civil affairs administration on the higher levels and bringing forth the corresponding suggestions.
sentences.chinese: 向上级民政部门反映家庭寄养工作情况并提出建议。

sentences.english: The ministry of civil affairs deputy inspector wu Ming recently told reporters.
sentences.chinese: 民政部副巡视员吴明日前告诉记者。

sentences.english: Hubei's civil affairs departments have been sending water and pumping more water from reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 湖北省民政部门已派出水从水库抽水更多的水。
